Subclasses of XFVRPOptImpBase in de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.opt.improve
 class XFVRP2Opt
          Standard 2-opt search by inverting the giant tour Implementation follows best ascent pattern by fully evaluating the n^2 neighborhood.
 class XFVRP2OptIntra
          Standard 2-opt search by inverting the giant tour Implementation follows best ascent pattern by fully evaluating the n^2 neighborhood.
 class XFVRP3CyclicTransfer
          Experimental procedure for a cyclic transfer with 3 nodes
 class XFVRP3Opt
          This neighborhood search means the 3-opt-edge exchange NS from literature.
 class XFVRP3PointMove
           
 class XFVRPOrOpt
           
 class XFVRPOrOptWithInvert
           
 class XFVRPPathExchange
          Path Exchange neighborhood search is a union of several neighborhoods - XFVRPRelocate - XFVRPSwap - XFVRPOrOpt2 - XFVRPSwapBody2 The neighborhoods are sequentially searched for the best improving step.
 class XFVRPRelocate
          Contains the optimization algorithms for 2-opt
 class XFVRPRelocate2
           
 class XFVRPSwap
          The swap neighborhood search improves a solution by exchanging two nodes at their positions.
 class XFVRPSwapSegment
          This neighborhood search produces improved solutions by exchanging two segments of the giant tour.
 class XFVRPSwapSegmentEqual
          This neighborhood search produces improved solutions by exchanging two segments of the giant tour.
 class XFVRPSwapSegmentWithInvert
          This neighborhood search produces improved solutions by exchanging two segments of the giant tour.
